"Oops! You’re in the wrong place. Isn’t that just kick you in the crotch, spit on your neck fantastic?!
You’re so far past the line, you can’t even see the line! The line is a dot to you!
But we’ll be there for you (because you’re there for us too), so we’ll take you back to the coffee house.
Pivot. Pivot. PIVOT.”
